ContentSnippet.Name: CSS Style
ContentSnippet.ContentSnippet:
<style><!--
.type ol {
	padding: 0;
}
.type ol li {
	margin: 0 0 10px 20px;
}
div.main-title-banner,
div.secondary-banner
{
	width: 100%;
	margin: 0;
}
div.main-title-banner,
div.small-image-label
{
	background-color: #0f6cb6;
}
div.secondary-banner {
	background-color: #000;
}
div.small-image1,
div.small-image2,
div.small-image3
{
	position: relative;
	float: left;
	border: 1px solid #888;
	width: 302px;
	height: 212px;
}
div.small-image1,
div.small-image2
{
	margin: 15px 19px 0 0;
}
div.small-image3 {
	margin: 15px 0 0 0;
}
div.small-image1:hover,
div.small-image2:hover,
div.small-image3:hover
{
	border-color: #282828;
}
div.small-image1:hover > div.small-image-label,
div.small-image2:hover > div.small-image-label,
div.small-image3:hover > div.small-image-label
{
	background-color: #fff;
}
div.small-image1:hover p,
div.small-image2:hover p,
div.small-image3:hover p
{
	color: #0f6cb6;
}
div.small-image-label {
	position: absolute;
	top: 0;
	width: 100%;
	height: 36px;
}
div.main-title-banner > p,
div.secondary-banner > p,
div.small-image-label > p
{
	margin: 5px auto;
	text-align: center;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-family: "Century Gothic", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
}
div.main-title-banner > p {
	height: 50px;
	letter-spacing: 2pt;
	font-size: 2.8em;
}
div.main-title-banner > p,
div.small-image-label > p
{
	color: #fff;
}
div.main-title-banner > p.slogan {
	font-weight: normal;
	font-family: Georgia, Times, serif;
	font-size: 1.1em;
	font-style: italic;
	height: 25px;
	letter-spacing: 0;
}
div.small-image-label > p {
	font-size: 1.2em;
}
div.secondary-banner > p {
	color: #fff;
	height: 40px;
	font-size: 2pt;
}
div.main-image {
	margin: -8px 0;
}
div.style-container {
	margin-top: -2px;
}
div.text-box {
	background-color: #ffcf06;
	padding: 20px 20px 25px 0;
	margin-bottom: 15px;
}
div.text-box > p,
div.text-box > h1,
div.text-box > h2,
div.text-box > h3,
div.text-box > h4,
div.text-box > hr
{
	color: #000;
}
div.text-box > h1,
div.text-box > h2,
div.text-box > h3,
div.text-box > h4
{
	text-transform: uppercase;
	letter-spacing: 3pt;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
}
div.text-box > p {
	font-size: 1.2em;
	margin-bottom: 0;
	padding-left: 20px;
}
div.main-title-container,
div.subtitle-container
{
	padding-right: 7px;
	background-repeat: no-repeat;
	background-position: right center;
	display: inline-block;
}
div.main-title-container {
	margin: 0;
	background-image: url("images/university-relations/education-week/side-arrow-black.png");
}
div.subtitle-container {
	margin: 20px 0 12px 0;
	background-image: url("images/university-relations/education-week/side-arrow-blue.png");
}
div.more-info p,
p.show-more
{
	margin-top: -20px;
}
hr.separator {
	background: #000;
	color: #000;
	margin: 15px 0 15px 0;
}
.type h1 {
	padding: 7px 20px;
	background-color: #000;
	letter-spacing: 4pt;
	font-size: 1.8em;
	line-height: 1.2em;
}
.type h1,
.type h2
{
	color: #fff;
	margin: 0;
	text-transform: uppercase;
	display: inline-block;
}
.type h2 {
	padding: 7px 17px;
	background-color: #0f6cb6;
	letter-spacing: 2pt;
	font-size: 1.3em;
	line-height: 1.1em;
}
.type h3 {
	padding-bottom: 0;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size: 1.1em;
}
span.make-link {
	position: absolute; 
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	top: 0;
	left: 0;
	z-index: 1;
	background-image: url("empty.png");
}

/* TABLES STYLE */
.type table {
	width: 410px;
	margin: 0 0 25px 0;
}
.type table th {
	color: #000;
	background-color: #ffcf06;
	font-size: 0.7em;
	letter-spacing: 1.5pt;
	text-transform: uppercase;
	padding-left: 20px;
}
.type table,
.type table caption,
div.hotel-copy
{
	-webkit-box-shadow: 2px 2px 3px #888;
	-moz-box-shadow: 2px 2px 3px #888;
	box-shadow: 2px 2px 3px #888;
}
.type table tbody tr:nth-child(even) td,
.type table tbody tr:nth-child(even):hover td
{
	background-color: #f1f1f1;
}
.type table tbody tr:nth-child(odd):hover td {
	background-color: #fff;
}
.type table td {
	color: #000;
	padding-left: 20px;
}
caption {
	background-color: #fff;
	caption-side: bottom;
	font-size: 0.7em;
}
--></style>
